alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Lincoln; McDuffie (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of McDuffie, western Columbia and southeastern Lincoln Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wrightsboro, or 7 miles northwest of Thomson, moving east at 30 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Strom Thurmond Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thomson, Harlem, Appling, Mistletoe State Park, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Wrightsboro, Dearing, Sweetwater Park, Winfield, McDuffie County Fire Department, Thomson Fire Department, McDuffie Regional Medical Center, White Oak Campground, Boneville, Double Branches, Columbia County Jail, Ansley Mill, Eubank-Blanchard Community Center, New Hope, and Loce. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 167 and 186. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
